          <title>
            <string language="en">Cooking potatoes in oil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kochen der Kartoffeln im Öl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cuisine des pommes de terre en huile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cozinhando batatas no óleo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cottura delle patate in olio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγειρεύοντας πατάτες στο πετρέλαιο</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows pieces of potatoes cooking in oil at 130 degrees Celsius.</string>
          </description>

Öl bei 130 Grad Celsius kochen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des morceaux de pommes 
de terre faisant cuire en huile à 130 degrés de Celsius.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra partes de batatas que 
cozinham no óleo em 130 graus Célsio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le parti delle patate 
che cucinano in olio centigrado a 130 gradi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κομμάτια των πατατών που 
μαγειρεύουν στο πετρέλαιο σε 130 βαθμούς Κελσίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra pedazos de patatas que 
cocinan en aceite en 130 grados de centígrado.</string>
